duties_responsibilities.duty: Process accounts receivable and accounts payable functions, including bank deposits, check processing, and reconciliations.
Match purchase orders and packing slips, enter invoices into the QuickBooks system, and process accounts payable check run batches.
Reconcile vendor statements, negotiate pricing with vendors, and order supplies for all locations.
Prepare and manage various accounting spreadsheets, allocations, and analyses related to billing and accounts receivable.
Manage accounts receivable related to cash deposits, reconciliations, and allocations of payments processed via bank check deposit scanner and credit card terminals.
Maintain accounting files and documentation thoroughly and accurately, assist with yearend 1099 process, and prepare yearly tangible tax documentation.
Work independently with minimal supervision, manage time efficiently, and meet deadlines.
Maintain strict confidentiality of all Finance Department information.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field (CPA preferred)
